alert.note: Alert for Kingman; Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 6:13AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Sedgwick, southeastern Kingman and northern Sumner Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 612 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cheney, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Haysville, Mulvane, Goddard, Clearwater, Cheney, Belle Plaine, Conway Springs, Garden Plain, Norwich, Viola, West Wichita, Eisenhower National Airport, Mcconnell Air Force Base, South Wichita, Milan, Oaklawn, Lake Afton and Riverdale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 4. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 22 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
